item.title: Pamela add a quote by Tim Burton
item.description: "Visions are worth fighting for. Why spend your life making someone else's dreams?" -- Tim Burton

item.title: Pamela add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "I am enough of an artist to draw freely upon my imagination. Imagination is more important than knowledge. Knowledge is limited. Imagination encircles the world." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Pamela add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "Science without religion is lame, religion without science is blind." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Pamela add a quote by Elbert Hubbard
item.description: "A friend is someone who knows all about you and still loves you." -- Elbert Hubbard

item.title: Pamela add a quote by Lizelia Augusta Jenkins Moorer
item.description:
"Let us give thanks to God above, Thanks for expressions of His love, Seen in the book of nature, grand Taught by His love on every hand.
Let us be thankful in our hearts, Thankful for all the truth imparts, For the religion of our Lord, All that is taught us in His word.
Let us be thankful for a land, That will for such religion stand; One that protects it by the law, One that before it stands in awe.
Thankful for all things let us be, Though there be woes and misery; Lessons they bring us for our good- Later 'twill all be understood.
Thankful for peace o'er land and sea, Thankful for signs of liberty, Thankful for homes, for life and health, Pleasure and plenty, fame and wealth.
Thankful for friends and loved ones, too, Thankful for all things, good and true, Thankful for harvest in the fall, Thankful to Him who gave it all." -- Lizelia Augusta Jenkins Moorer

item.title: Pamela add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "Don't cry because it's over, smile because it happened." -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: Pamela add a quote by Pamela Araya
item.description: "The monster in my head lingers still, but he is a good monster." -- Pamela Araya

item.title: Pamela add a quote by Pamela Araya
item.description: "En el Horizonte Cae la noche fiel que se ha alimentado De un sol viejo y cansado La Miro sin Miedo a revivir Por que ya no cuento Noches sin dormir Se que Vive aun un monstrou Dentro de mi Pero es un monstrou bueno." -- Pamela Araya
